metadata.Title: CVE-2015-8949 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
Use-after-free vulnerability in the my_login function in DBD::mysql before4.033_01 allows attackers to have unspecified impact by leveraging a callto mysql_errno after a failure of my_login.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-8949` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libdbd-mysql-perl - 4.025-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libdbd-mysql-perl package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.025-1ubuntu0.1').
